verses.verse: Now the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> gathered <S%H622>together<s%> their <S%H4264>armies<s%> to <S%H4421>battle<s%>, and were gathered <S%H622>together<s%> at <S%H7755>Shochoh<s%>, which belongeth to <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> between <S%H7755>Shochoh<s%> and <S%H5825>Azekah<s%>, in <S%H658>Ephes-dammim<s%>.

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were gathered <S%H622>together<s%>, and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> by the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H425>Elah<s%>, and set the <S%H4421>battle<s%> in <S%H6186>array<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>.

And the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> on a <S%H2022>mountain<s%> on the one side, and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> on a <S%H2022>mountain<s%> on the other side: and there was a <S%H1516>valley<s%> between them.

¶ And there went <S%H3318>out<s%> a <S%H376%H1143>champion<s%> out of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>, <S%H8034>named<s%> <S%H1555>Goliath<s%>, of <S%H1661>Gath<s%>, whose <S%H1363>height<s%> was <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> and a <S%H2239>span<s%>.

And he had an <S%H3553>helmet<s%> of <S%H5178>brass<s%> upon his <S%H7218>head<s%>, and he was <S%H3847>armed<s%> with a <S%H8302>coat<s%> of <S%H7193>mail<s%>; and the <S%H4948>weight<s%> of the <S%H8302>coat<s%> was <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> of <S%H5178>brass<s%>.
And he had <S%H4697>greaves<s%> of <S%H5178>brass<s%> upon his <S%H7272>legs<s%>, and a <S%H3591>target<s%> of <S%H5178>brass<s%> between his <S%H3802>shoulders<s%>.

And the <S%H6086%H2671>staff<s%> of his <S%H2595>spear<s%> was like a <S%H707>weaver's<s%> <S%H4500>beam<s%>; and his <S%H2595>spear's<s%> <S%H3852>head<s%> weighed <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> of <S%H1270>iron<s%>: and one <S%H5375>bearing<s%> a <S%H6793>shield<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him.

And he <S%H5975>stood<s%> and <S%H7121>cried<s%> unto the <S%H4634>armies<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, Why are ye come <S%H3318>out<s%> to set your <S%H4421>battle<s%> in <S%H6186>array<s%>? am not I a <S%H6430>Philistine<s%>, and ye <S%H5650>servants<s%> to <S%H7586>Saul<s%>? <S%H1262>choose<s%> you a <S%H376>man<s%> for you, and let him come <S%H3381>down<s%> to me.

If he be <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> with me, and to <S%H5221>kill<s%> me, then will we be your <S%H5650>servants<s%>: but if I <S%H3201>prevail<s%> against him, and <S%H5221>kill<s%> him, then shall ye be our <S%H5650>servants<s%>, and <S%H5647>serve<s%> us.

And the <S%H6430>Philistine<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, I <S%H2778>defy<s%> the <S%H4634>armies<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%>; <S%H5414>give<s%> me a <S%H376>man<s%>, that we may <S%H3898>fight<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>.

When <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> those <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistine<s%>, they were <S%H2865>dismayed<s%>, and <S%H3966>greatly<s%> <S%H3372>afraid<s%>.

¶ Now <S%H1732>David<s%> was the <S%H1121>son<s%> of that <S%H376%H673>Ephrathite<s%> of <S%H1035%H3063>Beth-lehem-judah<s%>, whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H3448>Jesse<s%>; and he had <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%>: and the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H935>went<s%> among <S%H582>men<s%> for an old <S%H2204>man<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%>.

And the <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1419>eldest<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3448>Jesse<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H310>followed<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> to the <S%H4421>battle<s%>: and the <S%H8034>names<s%> of his <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> that <S%H1980>went<s%> to the <S%H4421>battle<s%> were <S%H446>Eliab<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%>, and <S%H4932>next<s%> unto him <S%H41>Abinadab<s%>, and the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H8048>Shammah<s%>.
And <S%H1732>David<s%> was the <S%H6996>youngest<s%>: and the <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1419>eldest<s%> <S%H1980%H310>followed<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%>.
But <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> and <S%H7725>returned<s%> from <S%H7586>Saul<s%> to <S%H7462>feed<s%> his <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H6629>sheep<s%> at <S%H1035>Beth-lehem<s%>.
And the <S%H6430>Philistine<s%> drew <S%H5066>near<s%> <S%H7925>morning<s%> and <S%H6150>evening<s%>, and <S%H3320>presented<s%> himself <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>.

And <S%H3448>Jesse<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1732>David<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, <S%H3947>Take<s%> now for thy <S%H251>brethren<s%> an <S%H374>ephah<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H7039>parched<s%> corn, and these <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H3899>loaves<s%>, and <S%H7323>run<s%> to the <S%H4264>camp<s%> to thy <S%H251>brethren<s%>;

And <S%H935>carry<s%> these <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H2461%H2757>cheeses<s%> unto the <S%H8269>captain<s%> of their <S%H505>thousand<s%>, and <S%H6485>look<s%> how thy <S%H251>brethren<s%> <S%H7965>fare<s%>, and <S%H3947>take<s%> their <S%H6161>pledge<s%>.
Now <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, and they, and all the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, were in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H425>Elah<s%>, <S%H3898>fighting<s%> with the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>.

¶ And <S%H1732>David<s%> rose up <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%>, and <S%H5203>left<s%> the <S%H6629>sheep<s%> with a <S%H8104>keeper<s%>, and <S%H5375>took<s%>, and <S%H3212>went<s%>, as <S%H3448>Jesse<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> him; and he <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H4570>trench<s%>, as the <S%H2428>host<s%> was going <S%H3318>forth<s%> to the <S%H4634>fight<s%>, and <S%H7321>shouted<s%> for the <S%H4421>battle<s%>.
For <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> had put the battle in <S%H6186>array<s%>, <S%H4634>army<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> <S%H4634>army<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5203>left<s%> his <S%H3627>carriage<s%> in the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H8104>keeper<s%> of the <S%H3627>carriage<s%>, and <S%H7323>ran<s%> into the <S%H4634>army<s%>, and <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H7592%H7965>saluted<s%> his <S%H251>brethren<s%>.

And as he <S%H1696>talked<s%> with them, behold, there came <S%H5927>up<s%> the <S%H376%H1143>champion<s%>, the <S%H6430>Philistine<s%> of <S%H1661>Gath<s%>, <S%H1555>Goliath<s%> by <S%H8034>name<s%>, out of the <S%H4634%H4630>armies<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>, and <S%H1696>spake<s%> according to the <S%H428>same<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%>: and <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> them.
And all the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, when they <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%>, <S%H5127>fled<s%> from <S%H6440>him<s%>, and were <S%H3966>sore<s%> <S%H3372>afraid<s%>.

And the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Have ye <S%H7200>seen<s%> this <S%H376>man<s%> that is come <S%H5927>up<s%>? surely to <S%H2778>defy<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> is he come <S%H5927>up<s%>: and it shall be, that the <S%H376>man<s%> who <S%H5221>killeth<s%> him, the <S%H4428>king<s%> will <S%H6238>enrich<s%> him with <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H6239>riches<s%>, and will <S%H5414>give<s%> him his <S%H1323>daughter<s%>, and <S%H6213>make<s%> his <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H2670>free<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>spake<s%> to the <S%H582>men<s%> that <S%H5975>stood<s%> by him, <S%H559>saying<s%>, What shall be <S%H6213>done<s%> to the <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H5221>killeth<s%> <S%H1975>this<s%> <S%H6430>Philistine<s%>, and taketh <S%H5493>away<s%> the <S%H2781>reproach<s%> from <S%H3478>Israel<s%>? for who is this <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> <S%H6430>Philistine<s%>, that he should <S%H2778>defy<s%> the <S%H4634>armies<s%> of the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>?
And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H559>answered<s%> him after this <S%H1697>manner<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, So shall it be <S%H6213>done<s%> to the <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H5221>killeth<s%> him.

¶ And <S%H446>Eliab<s%> his <S%H1419>eldest<s%> <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> when he <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto the <S%H582>men<s%>; and <S%H446>Eliab's<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against <S%H1732>David<s%>, and he <S%H559>said<s%>, Why camest thou <S%H3381>down<s%> hither? and with whom hast thou <S%H5203>left<s%> <S%H2007>those<s%> <S%H4592>few<s%> <S%H6629>sheep<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>? I <S%H3045>know<s%> thy <S%H2087>pride<s%>, and the <S%H7455>naughtiness<s%> of thine <S%H3824>heart<s%>; for thou art come <S%H3381>down<s%> that thou mightest <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H4421>battle<s%>.
And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, What have I now <S%H6213>done<s%>? Is there not a <S%H1697>cause<s%>?

¶ And he <S%H5437>turned<s%> from <S%H681>him<s%> <S%H4136>toward<s%> <S%H312>another<s%>, and <S%H559>spake<s%> after the same <S%H1697>manner<s%>: and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H1697>answered<s%> him <S%H7725>again<s%> after the <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H1697>manner<s%>.

And when the <S%H1697>words<s%> were <S%H8085>heard<s%> which <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%>, they <S%H5046>rehearsed<s%> them <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%>: and he <S%H3947>sent<s%> for him.

¶ And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, Let no <S%H120>man's<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H5307>fail<s%> because of him; thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> will <S%H3212>go<s%> and <S%H3898>fight<s%> with this <S%H6430>Philistine<s%>.

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%>, Thou art not <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H3212>go<s%> against this <S%H6430>Philistine<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> with him: for thou art but a <S%H5288>youth<s%>, and he a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> from his <S%H5271>youth<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, Thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H7462>kept<s%> his <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H6629>sheep<s%>, and there <S%H935>came<s%> a <S%H738>lion<s%>, and a <S%H1677>bear<s%>, and <S%H5375>took<s%> a <S%H7716%H2089>lamb<s%> out of the <S%H5739>flock<s%>:

And I went <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him, and <S%H5221>smote<s%> him, and <S%H5337>delivered<s%> it out of his <S%H6310>mouth<s%>: and when he <S%H6965>arose<s%> against me, I <S%H2388>caught<s%> him by his <S%H2206>beard<s%>, and <S%H5221>smote<s%> him, and <S%H4191>slew<s%> him.

Thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H5221>slew<s%> both the <S%H738>lion<s%> and the <S%H1677>bear<s%>: and this <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> <S%H6430>Philistine<s%> shall be as <S%H259>one<s%> of them, seeing he hath <S%H2778>defied<s%> the <S%H4634>armies<s%> of the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>.

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> moreover, The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> that <S%H5337>delivered<s%> me out of the <S%H3027>paw<s%> of the <S%H738>lion<s%>, and out of the <S%H3027>paw<s%> of the <S%H1677>bear<s%>, he will <S%H5337>deliver<s%> me out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of this <S%H6430>Philistine<s%>. And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1732>David<s%>, <S%H3212>Go<s%>, and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> be with thee.

¶ And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H3847>armed<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> with his <S%H4055>armour<s%>, and he <S%H5414>put<s%> an <S%H6959>helmet<s%> of <S%H5178>brass<s%> upon his <S%H7218>head<s%>; also he <S%H3847>armed<s%> him with a coat of <S%H8302>mail<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H2296>girded<s%> his <S%H2719>sword<s%> upon his <S%H4055>armour<s%>, and he <S%H2974>assayed<s%> to <S%H3212>go<s%>; for he had not <S%H5254>proved<s%> it. And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, I <S%H3201>cannot<s%> <S%H3212>go<s%> with these; for I have not <S%H5254>proved<s%> them. And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5493>put<s%> them off him.

And he <S%H3947>took<s%> his <S%H4731>staff<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and <S%H977>chose<s%> him <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H2512>smooth<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> out of the <S%H5158>brook<s%>, and <S%H7760>put<s%> them in a <S%H7462>shepherd's<s%> <S%H3627>bag<s%> which he had, even in a <S%H3219>scrip<s%>; and his <S%H7050>sling<s%> was in his <S%H3027>hand<s%>: and he drew <S%H5066>near<s%> to the <S%H6430>Philistine<s%>.

And the <S%H6430>Philistine<s%> <S%H3212>came<s%> <S%H1980>on<s%> and drew <S%H7131>near<s%> unto <S%H1732>David<s%>; and the <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H5375>bare<s%> the <S%H6793>shield<s%> went <S%H6440>before<s%> him.

And when the <S%H6430>Philistine<s%> looked <S%H5027>about<s%>, and <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>, he <S%H959>disdained<s%> him: for he was but a <S%H5288>youth<s%>, and <S%H132>ruddy<s%>, and of a <S%H3303>fair<s%> <S%H4758>countenance<s%>.

And the <S%H6430>Philistine<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1732>David<s%>, Am I a <S%H3611>dog<s%>, that thou <S%H935>comest<s%> to me with <S%H4731>staves<s%>? And the <S%H6430>Philistine<s%> <S%H7043>cursed<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> by his <S%H430>gods<s%>.

And the <S%H6430>Philistine<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%>, <S%H3212>Come<s%> to me, and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> thy <S%H1320>flesh<s%> unto the <S%H5775>fowls<s%> of the <S%H8064>air<s%>, and to the <S%H929>beasts<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%>.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> to the <S%H6430>Philistine<s%>, Thou <S%H935>comest<s%> to me with a <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and with a <S%H2595>spear<s%>, and with a <S%H3591>shield<s%>: but I <S%H935>come<s%> to thee in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of the <S%H4634>armies<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, whom thou hast <S%H2778>defied<s%>.

This <S%H3117>day<s%> will the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5462>deliver<s%> thee into mine <S%H3027>hand<s%>; and I will <S%H5221>smite<s%> thee, and <S%H5493>take<s%> thine <S%H7218>head<s%> from thee; and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H6297>carcases<s%> of the <S%H4264>host<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> unto the <S%H5775>fowls<s%> of the <S%H8064>air<s%>, and to the wild <S%H2416>beasts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>; that all the <S%H776>earth<s%> may <S%H3045>know<s%> that there <S%H3426>is<s%> a <S%H430>God<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And all this <S%H6951>assembly<s%> shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3467>saveth<s%> not with <S%H2719>sword<s%> and <S%H2595>spear<s%>: for the <S%H4421>battle<s%> is the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%>, and he will <S%H5414>give<s%> you into our <S%H3027>hands<s%>.

And it came to pass, when the <S%H6430>Philistine<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%>, and <S%H3212>came<s%> and drew <S%H7126>nigh<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>, that <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H4116>hasted<s%>, and <S%H7323>ran<s%> toward the <S%H4634>army<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistine<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7971>put<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> in his <S%H3627>bag<s%>, and <S%H3947>took<s%> thence a <S%H68>stone<s%>, and <S%H7049>slang<s%> it, and <S%H5221>smote<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistine<s%> in his <S%H4696>forehead<s%>, that the <S%H68>stone<s%> <S%H2883>sunk<s%> into his <S%H4696>forehead<s%>; and he <S%H5307>fell<s%> upon his <S%H6440>face<s%> to the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

So <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H2388>prevailed<s%> <S%H4480>over<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistine<s%> with a <S%H7050>sling<s%> and with a <S%H68>stone<s%>, and <S%H5221>smote<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistine<s%>, and <S%H4191>slew<s%> him; but there was no <S%H2719>sword<s%> in the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>.

Therefore <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7323>ran<s%>, and <S%H5975>stood<s%> upon the <S%H6430>Philistine<s%>, and <S%H3947>took<s%> his <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and <S%H8025>drew<s%> it out of the <S%H8593>sheath<s%> thereof, and <S%H4191>slew<s%> him, and cut <S%H3772>off<s%> his <S%H7218>head<s%> therewith. And when the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> their <S%H1368>champion<s%> was <S%H4191>dead<s%>, they <S%H5127>fled<s%>.

And the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%>, and <S%H7321>shouted<s%>, and <S%H7291>pursued<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>, until thou <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H1516>valley<s%>, and to the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of <S%H6138>Ekron<s%>. And the <S%H2491>wounded<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> fell <S%H5307>down<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> to <S%H8189>Shaaraim<s%>, even unto <S%H1661>Gath<s%>, and unto <S%H6138>Ekron<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> from <S%H1814>chasing<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>, and they <S%H8155>spoiled<s%> their <S%H4264>tents<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistine<s%>, and <S%H935>brought<s%> it to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>; but he <S%H7760>put<s%> his <S%H3627>armour<s%> in his <S%H168>tent<s%>.

¶ And when <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> go <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistine<s%>, he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H74>Abner<s%>, the <S%H8269>captain<s%> of the <S%H6635>host<s%>, <S%H74>Abner<s%>, whose <S%H1121>son<s%> is this <S%H5288>youth<s%>? And <S%H74>Abner<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, As thy <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H2416>liveth<s%>, O <S%H4428>king<s%>, I <S%H518>cannot<s%> <S%H3045>tell<s%>.
And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H7592>Inquire<s%> thou whose <S%H1121>son<s%> the <S%H5958>stripling<s%> is.

And as <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> from the <S%H5221>slaughter<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistine<s%>, <S%H74>Abner<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> him, and <S%H935>brought<s%> him <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> with the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistine<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, Whose <S%H1121>son<s%> art thou, thou young <S%H5288>man<s%>? And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>answered<s%>, I am the <S%H1121>son<s%> of thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H3448>Jesse<s%> the <S%H1022>Beth-lehemite<s%>.
